sdm.epidemic.examples.A
Class Main

java.lang.Object
  simsim.core.Simulation
      sdm.epidemic.examples.A.Main
All Implemented Interfaces:
Displayable
public class Main
extends Simulation

This simple example shows how to create a simulation. In this simulation, a certain number of nodes is created and then initialized. The nodes never go offline, so the size of the system remains constant...
